author: cms-sw
body:
This PR proposes to patch thepeg to avoid warnings like
```
  include/ThePEG/Config/Unitsystem.h:163:29: warning: space between quotes and suffix is deprecated in C++23 [-Wdeprecated-literal-operator]
   163 | constexpr Length operator "" _mm( long double x ) {
      |                             ^~
      |                             --
  include/ThePEG/Config/Unitsystem.h:163:29: warning: space between quotes and suffix is deprecated in C++23 [-Wdeprecated-literal-operator]
   163 | constexpr Length operator "" _mm( long double x ) {
```
title: ThePeg: Patch it to avoid space between quotes and suffix is deprecated in c+23 warnings
